scripts.build: rm -rf dist && APP_NAME=$(echo "console.log(require('./package.json').name)" | node -) APP_VERSION=$(echo "console.log(require('./package.json').version)" | node -) APP_COMMIT=$(git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1) parcel build src/index.html --public-url /
scripts.dev: APP_NAME=$(echo "console.log(require('./package.json').name)" | node -) APP_VERSION=$(echo "console.log(require('./package.json').version)" | node -) APP_COMMIT=$(git log --pretty=format:'%h' -n 1) parcel watch src/index.html --public-url /
